meanings.definition: To lead or manage a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys honchoing the school project.
meanings.sent2: The CEO is honchoing the company's expansion plans.
meanings.sent3: The cat was honchoing the group of kittens during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The sun honchoed the planets in their orbits.
meanings.sent5: He honchoed the team to victory with his strong leadership.

meanings.definition: The act of overseeing or directing a project or team.
meanings.sent1: Her honchoing of the event ensured its success.
meanings.sent2: The honchoing of the construction project was well organized.
meanings.sent3: The honchoing of the bake sale turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: His honchoing of the team was like a captain steering a ship.
meanings.sent5: The honchoing of the play brought the audience to their feet in applause.
